meanings.definition: Toploftier (adjective): situated on the highest level
meanings.sent1: The toploftier shelf in the cupboard is hard to reach.
meanings.sent2: The penthouse apartment on the toploftier floor offers stunning views.
meanings.sent3: The cat thought it was toploftier than the dog when it climbed the tallest tree.
meanings.sent4: Her dreams reached the toploftier heights of success.
meanings.sent5: The toploftier mountain peak was covered in snow, glistening in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: Toploftier (noun): a person who occupies the highest position in a hierarchy
meanings.sent1: The CEO is considered the toploftier in the company.
meanings.sent2: The king was the toploftier in the kingdom.
meanings.sent3: The toploftier of the school cafeteria was the lunch lady who knew everyone's favorite meals.
meanings.sent4: In the world of bees, the queen bee is the toploftier.
meanings.sent5: The toploftier of the pirate ship was the captain, steering the crew through rough waters.
